title: [Good] Tinder updates their Privacy Policy and lists latest date at top.

tosdr.case: [Good] Tinder updates their Privacy Policy and lists latest date at top.-good-undefined
tosdr.tldr: When Tinder updates their Privacy Policy, they will revise the "last updated" date at the top of the Policy and recommend that you check back from time to time to inform yourself of any changes in the Privacy Policy or any of their other policies.
